function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unknown transmission dynamics of respiratory virus in the built environment","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in buildings","Mitigation":"Multidisciplinary research involving building professionals and epidemiologists to understand the links between architectural and facilities factors, occupant behaviors, and pathogen infection probability","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, environmental cleaning technologies, and space arrangement solutions","People":"Building occupants, building professionals, and epidemiologists","Owner":"Building professionals and epidemiologists"},{"Description":"Limitations in academic research on FM interventions for preventing respiratory infections","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of effective interventions, leading to increased risk of disease transmission in buildings","Mitigation":"Conducting further research to address the identified gaps and research limitations","Technologies":"Research methodologies, data analysis tools, and simulation technologies","People":"Academic researchers, building professionals, and epidemiologists","Owner":"Academic researchers and building professionals"}]}
